article.description: Marquez Haynes had 20 to lead Texas-Arlington past Texas A&amp,M-Corpus Christi in overtime on Wednesday.
article.headline: Haynes as 20 in UT-Arlington's overtime victory
article.linkText: UT-Arlington forces OT late, survives A&M-CC
article.story: ARLINGTON, Texas -- Marquez Haynes scored 20 points and Texas-Arlington defeated Texas A&M-Corpus Christi 71-66 Wednesday night. Brandon Long added 19 points and Tommy Moffitt had 10 rebounds for the Mavericks (11-9, 3-4 Southland). LaMarcus Reed made one of two free throws with 8 seconds to play for Texas-Arlington to force overtime. Reed scored four more points in the extra period as the Mavericks outscored the Islanders 12-7. Kevin Palmer scored 16 points and Demond Watt had 10 points and 10 rebounds for Texas A&M-Corpus Christi (11-10, 5-2). The Islanders committed 19 turnovers and made just 15 of their 33 free-throw attempts. The Mavericks were 25-for-35 from the line.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
